archiefmat.titel: Registers van aangiften tot ondertrouw, gedaan ten overstaan van raden van politie
archiefmat.titel_eng: Registers of notices of intentions to marry, given to the Councillors of Policy
archiefmat.notes:
The registers are arranged by denomination (Dutch Reformed vols. 1-2, Lutheran, Roman Catholic vols. 3-4 and Jewish vols. 5-6).

See also the index Suriname Ondertrouwregister gereformeerden 1747-1766, available on the Nationaal Archief (NA) website, Collectie - Indexen.
